abstract: Forty-three Republican senators signed on to the new Supreme Court filing, which accuses the president of grossly overstepping his executive power when he created programs to prevent the deportation of millions of undocumented immigrants, but of the 11 who did not, four are considered among this election cycle’s most vulnerable.

headline.main: Some G.O.P. Names Missing From Brief Accusing Obama of Immigration Overreach

snippet: Forty-three Republican senators signed on to the new Supreme Court filing, which accuses the president of grossly overstepping his executive power when he created programs to prevent the deportation of millions of undocumented immigrants, but of the 11 who did not, four are considered among this election cycle’s most vulnerable.
